snippet: The former Patriots and Jets running back Curtis Martin was among six players elected to the Pro Football Hall of Fame. Another finalist, the former coach Bill Parcells, did not make it.
abstract: NFL Roundup; former NFL running back Curtis Martin is among six players elected to the Pro Football Hall of Fame; former coach Bill Parcells reaches the final 10 candidates in the selection process, but misses the final cut; other NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: The former Patriots and Jets running back Curtis Martin was among six players elected to the Pro Football Hall of Fame. Another finalist, the former coach Bill Parcells, did not make it.

headline.seo: Curtis Martin Elected to Hall of Fame
headline.main: Martin Elected to Hall of Fame, but Parcells Misses the Cut
headline.print_headline: Martin Elected to Hall of Fame, but Parcells Misses the Cut
